title: Crucial models
extract: Solid state drives (SSDs) are designed to store important data and speed up your system. Designed with no moving parts, this means SSDs improve battery life. They're more reliable, durable, and can improve overall computer performance.
extract_html: Solid state drives (SSDs) are designed to store important data and speed up your system. Designed with no moving parts, this means SSDs improve battery life. They're more reliable, durable, and can improve overall computer performance.
